channel.title: Need help with Equipment Status (Armour Doest Show up)
channel.description:
On my server the defense stats and what not shows up but the Armour doesn't, I need help.
[IMG]http://i232.photobucket.com/albums/ee107/pkinnoobpk1/untitled-5.jpg[/img]
It looks like this(No Armour shows up on the character) (Above) but should look this this(Armour does show up on the character) (Below)
[IMG]http://i232.photobucket.com/albums/ee107/pkinnoobpk1/8.jpg[/img] Can any body help me figure this out, Ive been told its simple but i just cant figure it out.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 03, 2009, 08:32:31 am[/size][hr]Help?
